hymn.title: Set your mind on the things that are above

layout.singingstanza: Set your mind on the things that are a -- bove, Not on the things that are on earth. For you have died and your life Is hidden with Christ in God. When Christ Who is our life shall ap -- pear, Then we al -- so shall ap -- pear With Him in GLO -- RY!

lyrics.stanza: Set your mind on the things that are above, Not on the things that are on earth. For you have died, and your life Is hidden with Christ in God. When Christ Who is our life shall appear, Then we also shall appear with Him in GLORY!
